firstNightReminder: During Demon info, show the Demon two good character tokens that are in play and two good character tokens that are not in play (instead of their normal bluffs).
otherNightReminder: If the Broker died today or tonight: üëÅ Show the Demon 2 in-play character tokens. (zzz)
name: Broker
ability: The Demon receives 4 bluffs, but 2 are in-play characters. If you die, they learn which are in play.

firstNightReminder: üëÅ Show the Tattletale two character tokens, one in-play and one not-in-play. (zzz)
name: Tattletale
ability: You start knowing 2 characters, exactly 1 of which is in play.

firstNightReminder: üëÅ Show the Postmaster any not-in-play character token. (zzz)
otherNightReminder: üëÅ Show the Postmaster any not-in-play character token. (zzz)
name: Postmaster
ability: Each night, you learn a not-in-play character.

firstNightReminder: üëÅ Show the hand signal (0, 1, 2, 3, or 4) for the number of alive Outsiders with at least one alive neighbor who is evil. (zzz)
otherNightReminder: üëÅ Show the hand signal (0, 1, 2, 3, or 4) for the number of alive Outsiders with at least one alive neighbor who is evil. (zzz)
name: Bootblack
ability: Each night, you learn how many alive Outsiders have at least one alive neighbor who is evil. [+1 Outsider]

otherNightReminder: If a player chooses the Witness with their ability: Mark the Witness with their "Drunk" marker, making them drunk. If a player died tonight: üëÅ Point to a player who died tonight. Point to the category of the pointed-to character on the Witness' character sheet. (zzz)
name: Witness
ability: Each night*, learn what type of character killed a specific player tonight. If you are chosen, you are drunk until dawn.

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Lamplighter points to a player (not themself). (zzz) Mark that player with "Light Source".  Later tonight, mark players who choose the "Light Source" with "Safe".  Players marked with Lamplighter markers cannot die tonight.
name: Lamplighter
ability: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): they & players (other than yourself) who choose them cannot die tonight.

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Understudy points to a player. (zzz) Tonight, if that player dies, the Understudy dies instead . (zzz) üëÅ Wake the chosen player. Show the "This player selected you" card, then the Understudy token. (zzz)
name: Understudy
ability: Each night*, choose a player: if they die tonight, you die instead & they learn that they were protected.

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Thespian points to a player. (zzz) If that player is the Demon, the Thespian dies  and no one else can die tonight.
name: Thespian
ability: Each night*, choose a player: if you chose the Demon, you (and you alone) die tonight.

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Chauffeur points to a player (not themself & not the same as last night). (zzz) If that player is a Townsfolk, the Chauffeur cannot die tonight.
name: Chauffeur
ability: Each night*, choose an alive player (not the same as last night & not yourself): if they are a Townsfolk, you cannot die tonight.

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Pessimist points to 2 players. If either player is, in your estimation, more likely to die tonight than the other, point to that player. Otherwise, shrug.  (zzz)
name: Pessimist
ability: Each night*, choose 2 alive players: you learn which, if either, is more likely to die tonight.

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Matchmaker may point to 2 other alive players. (zzz) If the players are of different alignments, one of them dies.
name: Matchmaker
ability: Each night*, you may choose 2 alive players (not yourself): if they differ in alignment, one of them dies.

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Smuggler points to any number of players. (zzz) If more than 1 of them is evil, the Smuggler dies.
name: Smuggler
ability: Each night*, choose any number of players: if more than 1 is evil, you die.

otherNightReminder: If the Inquisitor's target did not respond truthfully today: the target dies.
name: Inquisitor
ability: Once per game, in day, publicly choose a player: they answer a yes/no question of your choice truthfully or die tonight.

otherNightReminder: You may choose that one of the players chosen by the Snakebite dies, even if for some reason they could not.
name: Snakebite
ability: You have a Townsfolk ability & think you are them. Each night*, a player you chose (since dawn) might die, even if they cannot.

name: Rabble-rouser
ability: If one of your alive neighbors chooses one or more players, you might be substituted for one of their choices.

otherNightReminder: If the Curator is marked with "Change Tonight": üëÅ Wake the Demon. Show the "This character selected you" card, then Curator token. The Demon either shows a "no" head signal or points to a non-Demon character on their sheet and a player. (zzz) If they chose a player and a character: Replace that player's character token with the chosen character token. üëÅ Wake that player. Show the "You are" card, then that player's new character token, then the hand sign (thumb-up "good", thumb-down "evil") for the player's current alignment. (zzz)
name: Curator
ability: If you died today or tonight, the Demon may choose a player & a non-Demon character they become (if not in play).

otherNightReminder: If the Pariah was executed today: üëÅ Show the "You are" card, then the thumb-down "evil" sign. (zzz)
name: Pariah
ability: If you are executed, you become evil.

name: Omen
ability: Things you are "mad" about might come true.

otherNightReminder: If one or more players are marked with the Gorgon's "Dead" markers: üëÅ Point to each of the marked players. The Gorgon may point to one of them. (zzz) The chosen player dies, if any. Remove "Dead" markers from players to whom the Gorgon did not point.
name: Gorgon
ability: Each night*, you learn which players chose you (since dawn); you may choose 1 of them: they die.

otherNightReminder: If the Crescendo was executed this game and has not used their ability yet: üëÅ The Crescendo nods "yes" or shakes "no" (zzz)  If they nodded "yes", do not remove any "Dead" markers (from any ability) at dawn and the marked players do not die. Place the "Suspended" marker in the center of the Grimoire as a reminder.  Tomorrow night, when the Crescendo would wake, all players marked "Dead" (from any ability) die (in normal night order).
name: Crescendo
ability: Once per game, at night*, if you died by execution, you may decide that players who die tonight die tomorrow night instead.

firstNightReminder: üëÅ The Tarantella points to a player. (zzz) Mark that player as "Poisoned".
otherNightReminder: üëÅ If the "Poisoned" player is alive, show their character token. Otherwise, the Tarantella points to a player. (zzz) Mark that player as "Poisoned". If a Townsfolk chooses the "Poisoned" player while they aren't marked "Moved", move the "Poisoned" to the chooser and mark them with "Moved". At dawn, remove the "Moved" marker.
name: Tarantella
ability: Each night, you learn the alive poisoned character; if there is none, choose a player: they are poisoned instead. The poison moves to the 1st Townsfolk to choose them each night.

firstNightReminder: üëÅ The Deathgripp points to a player. (zzz)
otherNightReminder: If the marked player is dead: their alive good neighbors die . Otherwise: the marked player dies. üëÅ The Deathgripp points to a player. (zzz)
name: Deathgripp
ability: If the player you chose last night is alive, they die. If not, their alive good neighbors die. Each night, choose an alive player.

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Veni Vidi Vici points to a player. (zzz) That player dies.  If the Veni Vidi Vici dies this way, check whether there are any alive Outsiders: if there are none, evil wins.
name: Veni Vidi Vici
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you kill yourself and no Outsiders live, evil wins instead. [exactly 3 Outsiders]

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Spree shakes their head "no" or, any number of times, points to a player, then a good character on their sheet. As they point to players and characters, mark the chosen players as "Dead". If the Spree makes an incorrect guess, remove all "Dead" markers and do not place any more. Otherwise, all marked players die. If the Spree did not choose anyone, you choose a player to die. (zzz)
name: Spree
ability: Each night*, choose any number of players and their good characters: if correct, they all die. If you chose no-one, a player dies.

otherNightReminder: If an ability (including its own) ever kills the Grist, mark a Minion as "Is the Demon". Wake that player, show the "You are" card, then the Grist token. üëÅ The Grist points to a player. (zzz) That player dies.
name: Grist
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you are killed by an ability, a Minion becomes an evil Grist.
